_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Testing
author: contato@corp.eng.br

installation.script:
# Create initial directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Create needed directories
mkdir -p /mnt/server/.local/bin

# clean old folders from last install
rm -rf /mnt/server/.local/bin/* /mnt/server/.local/bin/.[a-zA-Z0-9]*

echo "platform: ${PLATFORM}
arch: ${ARCH}
variant: ${VARIANT}
https_address: :${SERVER_PORT}
http_address: :${SERVER_PORT}
" > /mnt/server/.config/teste.yaml

echo "#!/bin/sh
echo \"finished\"

sleep 2
exec env /bin/sh" > /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/.local/bin/start.sh

sleep 5
echo -e "Install complete. Made this to not have issues."
